arg.name: max_inlier_distance
arg.description: Maximum distance in meters to consider inliers in plane estimation

arg.name: min_plane_points
arg.description: Minimum number of points for an hypothesis for be considered valid

arg.name: min_plane_points_percentage
arg.description: Minimum percentage of the total points to consider an hypothesis valid

arg.name: max_cos_distance
arg.description: Maximum cosine distance between an hypothesis and the initial calibration for an hypothesis to be considered valid

arg.name: max_iterations
arg.description: Number of maximum iterations in the plane estimation algorithm

arg.name: overwrite_xy_yaw
arg.description: Overwrite x, y, and yaw values with the initial calibration

arg.name: use_crop_box_filter
arg.description: Use an optional crop box filter to accelerate processing and ignore walls or other planes

arg.name: crop_box_min_x
arg.description: Minimum x value of the crop box filter

arg.name: crop_box_min_y
arg.description: Minimum y value of the crop box filter

arg.name: crop_box_min_z
arg.description: Minimum z value of the crop box filter

arg.name: crop_box_max_x
arg.description: Maximum x value of the crop box filter

arg.name: crop_box_max_y
arg.description: Maximum y value of the crop box filter

arg.name: crop_box_max_z
arg.description: Maximum z value of the crop box filter

arg.name: use_pca_rough_normal
arg.description: Whether to use PCA or the initial calibration for normal plane estimation
